title.rendered: Counselling sessions held for STeP students

content.rendered: Counseling sessions were conducted in centers of Delhi, Mumbai, Chennai, Kolkata and Bengaluru, Pune and Hyderabad on the 11th of November 2016. A total of 83 career counseling sessions were held. Interaction with youth on personality development, soft skills and their future career was done by personnel’s from various organizations. Sessions were taken up on development of confidence, facing interviews, decision making & to take jobs in their field of interest. The sessions help in motivating the students to go forth with different career choices.
